text: Nicolás Bazzana (born 23 February 1996) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a defender for Argentine Primera División side Aldosivi on loan from Estudiantes. ==Career== Bazzana initially started in the youth system of ADAFI, prior to joining Estudiantes' ranks. After fourteen years in their system, he made his professional debut for the club on 25 May 2017 during a Copa Libertadores match against Botafogo; having previously been an unused substitute four times in all competitions in 2017. His Argentine Primera División debut arrived on 23 February 2018 versus Huracán. Bazzana scored the first goal of his career in Estudiantes' 2017–18 league finale with Rosario Central on 14 May. ==Career statistics== . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|CupIncludes the Copa Argentina !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|ContinentalIncludes the Copa Libertadores !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="2"|Estudiantes |2016–17 |rowspan="2|Primera División |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||1One appearance in 2017 Copa Libertadores||0||0||0||1||0 |- |2017–18 |2||1||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0||2||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !2!!1!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!1!!0!!0!!0!!3!!1 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from La Plata Category:Argentine footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Estudiantes de La Plata footballers Category:Aldosivi footballers
